attributes.action: Comply with International Treaty obligations & dismantle all nuclear weapons, delivery systems & research & development facilities, & use the monies released for civil & military purposes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have signed up to various Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaties, which require us to reduce & eventually destroy all our nukes & associated systems. We should comply with these treaties to set an example, improve our standing in the world community, & release funds to the rest of the Government.
